snippet: One of Bahrain’s most prominent human rights activists, Nabeel Rajab, was arrested for posting critical remarks about the government on Twitter.
lead_paragraph: One of Bahrain’s most prominent human rights activists, Nabeel Rajab, was arrested for posting critical remarks about the government on Twitter.

headline.print_headline: Bahrain Arrests Rights Activist Over Tweets About Torture
